attributes.message:
The following integrations and platforms could not be set up:

 - automation ([Show logs](/config/logs?filter=automation))
 - [alert](https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/alert) ([Show logs](/config/logs?filter=alert))

Please check your config and [logs](/config/logs).
attributes.title: Invalid config

attributes.release_summary:
## v0.108.2 [2022-06-03]
* Switched to ignoring 'upgrade' backups by default for new users.
* Added a warning for existing users if you're not ignoring upgrade backups.
* Added a warning about google's OOB deprecation for private credential users.

## v0.
attributes.title: Home Assistant Google Drive Backup
attributes.friendly_name: Home Assistant Google Drive Backup: Update

attributes.release_summary:
## What’s changed

## ⬆️ Dependency updates

- ESPHome from 2022.6.1 to 2022.6.2 @dependabot (#472)
attributes.title: Studio Code Server

attributes.release_summary:
## What’s changed

## 🐛 Bug fixes

- 🚑 Fix missing nmcli @frenck (#415)
attributes.title: SSH & Web Terminal

attributes.release_summary:
# Changelog

## 1.15.0

- Use Supervisor API to detect IPv6 host addresses, selectable by interface
- Split IPv4 and IPv6 updates as duckdns skips v4 detection with v6 present
- Fix misleading help text regarding IPv6 address autodetection
- Disable Docke
attributes.title: Duck DNS

attributes.release_summary:
## v5.0.2
**!!!!! WARNING !!!!!**\
The 5.x releases are breaking release when upgrading from 4.x versions, please be sure to read the [v5.0.0](#v500) release notes below for full details as manual steps may be required.

**Dependency Updates***
- Bump rin
attributes.title: Ring-MQTT with Video Streaming

attributes.friendly_name: Is Simeon or Claire at home?

templates.icon: if ( state === 'Home' ) return 'mdi:home'; if ( state === 'Away' ) return 'mdi:home-export-outline'; if ( state === 'Returning' ) return 'mdi:home-import-outline'; return 'mdi:beach';

if ( state ===  '0' ) return 'mdi:account-off'; if ( state ===  '1' ) return 'mdi:account'; if ( state === '2' ) return 'mdi:account-multiple'; if ( state ===  '3' ) return 'mdi:account-group'; return 'mdi:account-multiple-plus';

create.name: Create
create.description: Show a notification in the frontend.

message.name: Message
message.description: Message body of the notification. [Templates accepted]
message.example: Please check your configuration.yaml.

title.name: Title
title.description: Optional title for your notification. [Templates accepted]

notification_id.name: Notification ID
notification_id.description: Target ID of the notification, will replace a notification with the same ID.

dismiss.name: Dismiss
dismiss.description: Remove a notification from the frontend.

notification_id.name: Notification ID
notification_id.description: Target ID of the notification, which should be removed.

notification_id.name: Notification ID
notification_id.description: Target ID of the notification, which should be mark read.

save_persistent_states.name: Save Persistent States
save_persistent_states.description: Save the persistent states (for entities derived from RestoreEntity) immediately. Maintain the normal periodic saving interval.

turn_off.name: Generic turn off
turn_off.description: Generic service to turn devices off under any domain.

turn_on.name: Generic turn on
turn_on.description: Generic service to turn devices on under any domain.

toggle.name: Generic toggle
toggle.description: Generic service to toggle devices on/off under any domain

check_config.name: Check configuration
check_config.description: Check the Home Assistant configuration files for errors. Errors will be displayed in the Home Assistant log.

update_entity.name: Update entity
update_entity.description: Force one or more entities to update its data

reload_config_entry.name: Reload config entry
reload_config_entry.description: Reload a config entry that matches a target.

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Start purge task - to clean up old data from your database.

keep_days.name: Days to keep
keep_days.description: Number of history days to keep in database after purge.

repack.name: Repack
repack.description: Attempt to save disk space by rewriting the entire database file.

apply_filter.name: Apply filter
apply_filter.description: Apply entity_id and event_type filter in addition to time based purge.

purge_entities.name: Purge Entities
purge_entities.description: Start purge task to remove specific entities from your database.

domains.name: Domains to remove
domains.description: List the domains that need to be removed from the recorder database.

entity_globs.name: Entity Globs to remove
entity_globs.description: List the glob patterns to select entities for removal from the recorder database.

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Start the recording of events and state changes

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: Stop the recording of events and state changes

message.name: Message
message.example: Something went wrong

logger.name: Logger
logger.description: Logger name under which to log the message. Defaults to 'system_log.external'.

set_default_level.name: Set default level
set_default_level.description: Set the default log level for integrations.

level.name: Level
level.description: Default severity level for all integrations.

remote_connect.name: Remote connect
remote_connect.description: Make instance UI available outside over NabuCasa cloud

set_theme.name: Set theme
set_theme.description: Set a theme unless the client selected per-device theme.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: The mode the theme is for.

addon_update.name: Update add-on.
addon_update.description: Update add-on. This service should be used with caution since add-on updates can contain breaking changes. It is highly recommended that you review release notes/change logs before updating an add-on.

slug.name: Slug
slug.description: Slug of backup to restore from.

slug.name: Slug
slug.description: Slug of backup to restore from.

install.name: Install update
install.description: Install an update for this device or service

version.name: Version
version.description: Version to install, if omitted, the latest version will be installed.

backup.name: Backup
backup.description: Backup before installing the update, if supported by the integration.

skip.name: Skip update
skip.description: Mark currently available update as skipped.

clear_skipped.name: Clear skipped update
clear_skipped.description: Removes the skipped version marker from an update.

speedtest.name: Speed test
speedtest.description: Immediately execute a speed test with Fast.com

turn_on.name: Turn on
turn_on.description: Turn a media player power on.

turn_off.name: Turn off
turn_off.description: Turn a media player power off.

toggle.name: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggles a media player power state.

volume_up.name: Turn up volume
volume_up.description: Turn a media player volume up.

volume_down.name: Turn down volume
volume_down.description: Turn a media player volume down.

media_play.name: Play
media_play.description: Send the media player the command for play.

media_pause.name: Pause
media_pause.description: Send the media player the command for pause.

media_stop.name: Stop
media_stop.description: Send the media player the stop command.

media_next_track.name: Next
media_next_track.description: Send the media player the command for next track.

media_previous_track.name: Previous
media_previous_track.description: Send the media player the command for previous track.

clear_playlist.name: Clear playlist
clear_playlist.description: Send the media player the command to clear players playlist.

volume_set.name: Set volume
volume_set.description: Set a media player's volume level.

volume_level.name: Level
volume_level.description: Volume level to set as float.

media_seek.name: Seek
media_seek.description: Send the media player the command to seek in current playing media.

seek_position.name: Position
seek_position.description: Position to seek to. The format is platform dependent.

join.name: Join
join.description: Group players together. Only works on platforms with support for player groups.

group_members.name: Group members
group_members.description: The players which will be synced with the target player.

select_source.name: Select source
select_source.description: Send the media player the command to change input source.

source.name: Source
source.description: Name of the source to switch to. Platform dependent.

select_sound_mode.name: Select sound mode
select_sound_mode.description: Send the media player the command to change sound mode.

sound_mode.name: Sound mode
sound_mode.description: Name of the sound mode to switch to.

play_media.name: Play media
play_media.description: Send the media player the command for playing media.

media_content_id.name: Content ID
media_content_id.description: The ID of the content to play. Platform dependent.

media_content_type.name: Content type
media_content_type.description: The type of the content to play. Like image, music, tvshow, video, episode, channel or playlist.

enqueue.name: Enqueue
enqueue.description: If the content should be played now or be added to the queue.

announce.name: Announce
announce.description: If the media should be played as an announcement.

unjoin.name: Unjoin
unjoin.description: Unjoin the player from a group. Only works on platforms with support for player groups.

message.name: Message
message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

title.name: Title
title.description: Optional title for your notification. Will be composed as '%title\n%message'

target.name: Target
target.description: An array of pre-authorized chat_ids to send the notification to. If not present, first allowed chat_id is the default.

disable_notification.name: Disable notification
disable_notification.description: Sends the message silently. iOS users and Web users will not receive a notification, Android users will receive a notification with no sound.

disable_web_page_preview.name: Disable web page preview
disable_web_page_preview.description: Disables link previews for links in the message.

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout for send message. Will help with timeout errors (poor internet connection, etc)s

keyboard.name: Keyboard
keyboard.description: List of rows of commands, comma-separated, to make a custom keyboard. Empty list clears a previously set keyboard.

inline_keyboard.name: Inline keyboard
inline_keyboard.description: List of rows of commands, comma-separated, to make a custom inline keyboard with buttons with associated callback data.
inline_keyboard.example: ["/button1, /button2", "/button3"] or ["Text button1:/button1, Text button2:/button2", "Text button3:/button3"] or [[["Text button1", "/button1"], ["Text button2", "/button2"]], [["Text button3", "/button3"]]]

message_tag.name: Message tag
message_tag.description: Tag for sent message. In telegram_sent event data: {{trigger.event.data.message_tag}}

username.name: Username
username.description: Username for a URL which require HTTP authentication.

password.name: Password
password.description: Password (or bearer token) for a URL which require HTTP authentication.

authentication.name: Authentication method
authentication.description: Define which authentication method to use. Set to `digest` to use HTTP digest authentication, or `bearer_token` for OAuth 2.0 bearer token authentication. Defaults to `basic`.

target.description: An array of pre-authorized chat_ids to send the document to. If not present, first allowed chat_id is the default.

disable_notification.description: Sends the message silently. iOS users and Web users will not receive a notification, Android users will receive a notification with no sound.

verify_ssl.name: Verify SSL
verify_ssl.description: Enable or disable SSL certificate verification. Set to false if you're downloading the file from a URL and you don't want to validate the SSL certificate of the server.

timeout.description: Timeout for send photo. Will help with timeout errors (poor internet connection, etc)

chat_id.name: Chat ID
chat_id.description: The chat_id where to edit the reply_markup.

inline_keyboard.name: Inline keyboard

answer_callback_query.name: Answer callback query
answer_callback_query.description: Respond to a callback query originated by clicking on an online keyboard button. The answer will be displayed to the user as a notification at the top of the chat screen or as an alert.

message.name: Message

callback_query_id.name: Callback query ID
callback_query_id.description: Unique id of the callback response.

message_id.name: Message ID

process.name: Process

color_extract_path.name: Path

transition.name: Transition

entities.name: Entities state

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Transition duration it takes to bring devices to the state defined in the scene.

turn_on.name: Turn on
turn_on.description: Turn on one or more lights and adjust properties of the light, even when they are turned on already.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Duration it takes to get to next state.

rgb_color.name: Color
rgb_color.description: The color for the light (based on RGB - red, green, blue).

rgbw_color.name: RGBW-color
rgbw_color.description: A list containing four integers between 0 and 255 representing the RGBW (red, green, blue, white) color for the light.

rgbww_color.name: RGBWW-color
rgbww_color.description: A list containing five integers between 0 and 255 representing the RGBWW (red, green, blue, cold white, warm white) color for the light.

hs_color.name: Hue/Sat color
hs_color.description: Color for the light in hue/sat format. Hue is 0-360 and Sat is 0-100.

xy_color.name: XY-color
xy_color.description: Color for the light in XY-format.

color_temp.name: Color temperature
color_temp.description: Color temperature for the light in mireds.

kelvin.name: Color temperature (Kelvin)
kelvin.description: Color temperature for the light in Kelvin.

brightness.name: Brightness value
brightness.description: Number indicating brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness and 255 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness
brightness_pct.description: Number indicating percentage of full brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness and 100 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

white.name: White
white.description: Set the light to white mode and change its brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness and 255 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

profile.name: Profile
profile.description: Name of a light profile to use.

turn_off.name: Turn off
turn_off.description: Turns off one or more lights.

hold_secs.name: Hold Seconds

device.name: Device

command.name: Command
